kun reading compounds: 一人【ひとり】one person, being alone, being by oneself, being single, being unmarried, by oneself, alone, just, only, simply

一人歩き【ひとりあるき】taking on a life of it's own (of a rumour, etc.), walking by oneself, talking a walk by oneself, walking unaided, being able to walk without help, standing on one's own feet, being independent, taking care of oneself
